name: Danish 92 Group - Forum for Sustainable Development
goal: The Danish 92 Group - Forum for Sustainable Development is a network of Danish development and environmental organisations working for sustainable development.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade
